alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 7:00PM CDT until April 29 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NUCKOLLS...WEBSTER AND SOUTHWESTERN THAYER COUNTIES... At 700 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Blue Hill to near Burr Oak, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Rosemont around 705 PM CDT. Lawrence around 710 PM CDT. Bostwick around 715 PM CDT. Superior around 725 PM CDT. Hardy around 730 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Kansas...and south central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
